statements: DELETE FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE initiative_name = 'LED Lighting Upgrade';
DELETE FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE community_id = 100 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE energy_savings > 5000 AND impact_on_sustainability = 'Positive' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM communities WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM communities WHERE location = 'New York' AND sustainability_goal = 'Zero Waste'
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE community_name = 'Green Valley' AND consumption_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE communities, initiatives FROM communities LEFT JOIN initiatives ON communities.community_id = initiatives.community_id WHERE communities.region = 'North';
